name: TurtleBook
description:
Note: This game is in early development. Bugs are to be expected.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Join Carlos, the Genius Programmer who also happens to be a turtle as him and his group of developers create a social network for all animals to enjoy.

This is a short, comedic, narrative driven story that was made in a couple weeks. This is my first real project, so please feel free to give feedback.

Updates will be added sometime in the future.
